name: Firefox: Yosemite-style dev theme tab bar
description: Adds fancy effects to dev theme tab bar on macOS.
additional_info:
This style sheet adds Yosemite-style blur/vibrancy effects to the tab bar when using the light dev theme on OS X.

Change log:

2017-03-10:
- Fixes for theme attribute in Firefox 53

2016-11-21:
- Fixes for tab-separator changes in Firefox 51

2015-09-01:
- Fixes for tab-separator changes in Firefox 42
